data.text: Halli Paul in Derbe li Lystra um atungjei; khawakhan akangamna Jihudi numeisa inkhat sapa, Timothy inti siamruoi inkhat aleiom; apa chu Greek alei eii.
Lystra khat-um Iconiumma kaom ule-nai ngai'n ama jarra katha tak-ah inleiril.
Paul in Timothy le inruoiya aleisizoot; khawa ramma kaom Jihudi ngai jarra Paul in amakha aruoiya wun atanpijei; ajarchu apa kha Greek eii ti inmani rakip in inleijet.
Inmani'n khuopui rakip hin inheiwapha, Jerusalemma kaom tirton khat-um uparup ngai inzootna chongkha inmani diang juiru inleitipi.
Hinthoa koisuok ngaikha ngamnatiang kheella inhongngar, halli nisuo ah kangamna miring inhongkheeljei.
Asia ramsuungnga insiya chongkha rilsik Ratha Inthiang in inmani diang apemak jarra, Phrygia khat-um Galatia ramma inheikirjei.
Halli inmani'n Mysia ramkooltiang inheiwapha, inmani'n Bithynia luutnasik inleitho; takkha Jisu Ratha khan leizootpi makjei.
Khawa jarra inmani'n Mysia inrakaanna Troas tiang inchumjei.
Halli Paul in khawani zaankhan mangtalar inkhat aleimu, khawa mangtalar khan Macedonia mi inkhat in angirra amadiang ileini kha aleimu, “Mecedonia ah heiwa inlang keini najuosanru!”
Paul in hiwa mangtalar muli-mumak, Pathian in inmani diang Akatha Chong rilnasik anakoi jei ti kinjet ah, keini'n Macedonia tiang sinasik kinngirjei.
Khawa jarra keini'n Troas makheiya, Samothrace katung phitsik rakuong kinchuongnga, khat-um ziingkhuo warli Neapolis kinhongtung,
halli khawa makheiya keini'n Philippi katung kinhongjei, hiwa munhi Macedonia ramkarra akalok khet khuopui khat-um Rome ngai'n kut-inchal ram alei eii, khawakhan keini nikhuo katamtak kinleiom.

Jihudi ngai sernikhuo khan keini'n khuopui kinrakaanna tuidung raalkhattiang, ninasik mun lei-omte ti kinngaidonna, khawa katung kinleisi; halli keini'n kin-in-ongnga, inchun numeisa ngaidiang kinleiminchujei.

Thyatira khuopuiya araming Lydia inti, puonkasenjun kajuor Pathian chubei katho numeisa inkhat in inminchu kha aleirangai; halli Paul in iril chongkha malungkaluut ah rangainasik Pumi'n ama malungkha amalongpijei.
Ama le a-innsuung mi ngai baptize inthosuopha, ama'n ati, kei Pumi kangamna eii tia nangni'n ningngaidonjei inchu, “Ka-inna hong-inlang hong-omru.” Ama'n keini diang anati.

Halli nisuokhat keini'n nina munkhan kinsipha, ratha kathamak kachoi suoknumeisa inkhat keinile kinlei-intong, ama'n nuktiangnga kasuoksik arilsuok mator jarra ama suokchangna mapu ngaisik sial katamtak aleilou.
Hiwa nungaaknu in Paul khat-um keini nuk anahongjuiya akheek ah ahongti, einidiang ringnasik jarra chong nakarilpi mi ngaihi Insaangkhet Pathian suok ngaikha in-eii.

Halli ama'n hiwahi apha kasoottak aleitho, takkha Paul in ahalla inletli ratha diangkhan ati, ama diangnga inphut heisuoknasik “Jisu Christa ramingnga nangdiang chong kanapeii.” Khawapha takkhan ratha kha asuokjei.
Khawa suoknu mapu ngaikhan inmani nemna ngai rakip kha inmangsuo inmupha khan, inmani'n Paul li Silas kha insurra, phaipui suungnga inkei-karuolla lamkakei ngai maikuungnga inheiruoi;
halli inmani'n Paul li Silas kha chongkatan mapu ngai maikuungnga inhongruoiya inti, hiwa mingaihi Jihudi in-eii, inmani'n eini khuopuihi inminhaangjei;
halli eini dan le in-angmak omchan ngaikha innaminchu einichu Rome mi ni-ejarra inmani omchan dan kha juitheinumin, inleiti.
Halli mipui inphuhut ah Paul li Silas chungnga inzootmakle inruoiya.
Inmani'n kase-ah inzeemli, mikhumna khan inda ah, kacheet ah ngaaknasik mikhumna ka-ngaakpa diang chong inpejei.
Ama'n hituk kana chong ajetli, inmani kha mikhumna suung-innungkhet tiang akeiluut ah, inkeii kha thingrakol aminsurpijei.
Zaanchim pheiwei khan Paul li Silas nina innei halli Pathian minpaakna laa inleisak, halli mikhumna suungnga kaom ngaikhan inmani inleirangai;
Jetlei-theileiya ka-ngartak rinook hongnga mikhumna innkha innikjei, halli khawa phatak khan innkhar rakip-um inlongjei, inkhit ah kaom mi rakip-um insuutjei.
Mikhumna kangaakpa'n ahong-intheili, mikhumna innkhar rakip inlong kha ahongmu pha, mikhumna suungnga kaom rakip intaan suojei ti angaidonna, achem akeisuo ah insunthatsik athojei.
Takkha Paul in rasa inringnga aheikheek, natheinuo ah thinasik thomaro, ajarchu keini rakip hin kinlaom.
Khawapha mikhumna ka-ngaakpa khan meiser anili innot-ah aluut jei, kachile inruoiya intuulla Paul li Silas maikuungnga inbokjei.
Halli ama'n inmani akeisuo ah ati, karu ngai ringnasik ah kei'n angme kathosik?
Inmani'n inti, “Pumi Jisu Christa ngamnaro, halli nang-um na-innsuungkhur-um ringna ningmusik eii.”
Halli inmani'n ama diang-um innsuung mi rakip diang-um Pumi chongkha inleiminchujei.
Khawani zaan takkhan ama'n inmani kha aruoiya inmani ramolbi ngaikha arasupijei, halli khawapha takkhan amale a-innsuung mi rakip um baptize inthojei.
Halli ama'n inmani kha ama inna aruoili, inmani maikuungnga baksik aleiminsuukpi, halli Pathian diang inngamna inneiya, ama innsuung mi rakip karok in asipjei.
Ziingkhuo ahongwar pha, Rome chongkatan ngai'n raalmi kalok inheitirra inti, “Mi ngaikha masuoru.”
Halli mikhumna ka-ngaakpa in Paul diang chongkha arilpi jei, chongkatan ngaikhan nangni inni kha masuonasik chong inheimintungjei; khawa jarra tuunchu heisuok inlang kahoiya nasipitaru.

Takkha Paul in inmani diang ati, chongtan tholeiya Rome keinihi mipui maikuungnga inmani'n innawuokli, mikhumna ah innadajei, halli tuunchu inmani'n keinihi ruuk ah innapuutsik be? zootmung; inmani inpumtak heiwasu-inlang keini hi nakeisuorasu.
Raalmi ngaikhan chongkatan ngaidiang chonghi injuomindik pha, Paul li Silas hi Rome mi in-eii ti injetli inmani ngaikhan inchijei;
halli inmani'n inheiwa ah nangaidamru injuoti, khat-um raalmi ngai'n inmani kha mikhumna makheiya katha ah inruoiya, khuopui makheiya nasuokpitaru inleitipi.
Inmani'n mikhumna ah inphut inheisuokli, Lydia innkhan inluutjei, halli inmani'n ule-nai ngai khale in-inmuwa, inmani kha inleimasok ah inmathaanna insijei.
